description: Damon is one of the few descendants of the People of the Vale. As a young boy, he and his mother, Juanita, travelled to the ruins of his people`s kingdom. Juanita expressed her wish that their old home would be resurrected, which inspired Damon. He searched for Victini in hopes of resurrecting his people`s old kingdom by using Victini`s power.
name: Dread Grangil
